head_office_address: Catalyst Inc, Unit 10 The Innovation Centre, Queens Road
eu_initiatives:
We follow all guidelines given in relation to the interreg project we are part of. 
We also follow all GDPR regulations. 
Threats to EU and in particular Interreg funding as a result of UK withdrawal. threats to the development of a regional economy resulting from any form of UK withdrawal
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
We have received INTERREG funding for a number of projects: 
-Interreg IVa supporting the development of the regional knowledge economy through the North West Regional Science Park. Launch events were held in both Derry and Letterkenny at which NI & ROI government ministers and the managing authority SEUPB attended. 
-Intrerreg VA supporting 100 PhD years through the North West Centre of Advanced Manufacturing.  
 
We have attended events in both the eligible inter region and Brussels to publicise the projects. Again a launch event was held attended by politicians, academia and business
goals__remit:
Catalyst Inc is Northern Ireland’s next generation science park. We are a not-for-proﬁt organisation that invests the surplus generated from our agile workspace and facilities, providing the underwriting necessary for the community-led development of our entrepreneurial innovation ecosystem through Connect and Capital Match. 
 
Key to our model is the co-location of major technology corporations, world-class research and startups. Over 3,000 engineers, researchers, entrepreneurs and executives work in our campuses in Belfast, Derry/ Londonderry and Ballymena. 
 
OUR VISION FOR NORTHERN IRELAND 
A community of innovators so powerful that its people can change the world. 
 
This is based on our passionate belief that innovation has the power to transform NI into one of Europe’s most entrepreneurial and inclusive knowledge economies by 2030. 
 
OUR MISSION IS TO  
Provide the home, networks and empathy to nurture anyone with the talent and ambition to produce world leading products and services.
